title: Punar Vivah - Zindagi Milegi Dobara
resume: Punar Vivah is an Indian soap opera that airs on Zee TV. It premiered on 20 February 2012 and replaced Bhagonwali-Baante Apni Taqdeer. It aired every Monday-Friday at 10:30 pm. The show completed one year of run on 20 February 2013 and 300 episodes on 12 April 2013 And Also Had A good Fan Following of the Yash and Aarti couple in the show which made had gave them fame and Luckily, receive two Awards for the Couple. This season ended 17 May 2013 and Punar Vivah - Ek Nayi Umeed replaced Punar Vivah from 20 May 2013.

Login to create it. en Login Sign Up  ID: 46943   Expand Punar Vivah - Zindagi Milegi Dobara User Score  Play Trailer Overview Punar Vivah is an Indian soap opera that airs on Zee TV. It premiered on 20 February 2012 and replaced Bhagonwali-Baante Apni Taqdeer. It aired every Monday-Friday at 10:30 pm. The show completed one year of run on 20 February 2013 and 300 episodes on 12 April 2013 And Also Had A good Fan Following of the Yash and Aarti couple in the show which made had gave them fame and Luckily, receive two Awards for the Couple. This season ended 17 May 2013 and Punar Vivah - Ek Nayi Umeed replaced Punar Vivah from 20 May 2013.
